title: Jim Carrey and girlfriend Ginger Gonzaga call it quits after less than a year of dating
text:
Jim Carrey and Ginger Gonzaga have reportedly split.

The Mask star had been romancing the 35-year-old actress since January, but it now seems the pair have decided to call it quits, according to Us Weekly.

Multiple sources have reported to the outlet that the 57-year-old star is officially single again.

It's over: Jim Carrey and Ginger Gonzaga have reportedly split after less than a year of dating, according to Us Weekly (Pictured in January)

One source told the outlet that the former couple actually split earlier this year, but the news has not yet been confirmed by either Jim or Ginger.

The pair met when they played on screen love interests on the Showtime drama comedy Kidding.

They made their relationship official when they stepped out on the red carpet together at the Showtime Golden Globes Nominees Celebration in West Hollywood on January 5.

A day later, the now-former couple were spotted flaunting their love at the award ceremony, where they walked hand in hand before heading into the Beverly Hilton for the 76th Golden Globe Awards.

Short lived: The 57-year-old started dating the actress who was nearly 20 years his junior in January but one source said that the former couple actually split earlier this year, but the news has not yet been confirmed by either Jim or Ginger (Pictured in January)

The event marked the pair's first public event together, and came just a couple of months after Jim admitted he lives an 'isolated' life.

He said: 'You could describe my home life as an isolated life. I spend a lot of time by myself but I like being by myself, so it's OK. That might be strange to some people, but I enjoy it.'

And the Ace Ventura: Pet Detective actor previously insisted he isn't bothered about what people will think of him when he dies.

Asked what he wants to be remembered for, he said: 'I'm free of the business. I'm not the business. I don't care what people think of me after I die.'

The beginning: The pair met when they played on screen love interests on the Showtime drama comedy Kidding and went public with their romance at this event in January

'All I want is for people to think of me as a good energy here, a nice fragrance that has been left behind.'

Jim's romantic life has had some ups and downs and even tragedy over the years.

He's been wed twice, first to a former actress named Melissa Womer from 1987 to 1995. They share daughter Jane Erin Carrey who was born September 6 the same year they tied the knot.

Ups and downs: Jim has been wed twice, first to a former actress named Melissa Womer from 1987 to 1995 with whom he shares daughter Jane Erin Carrey (Pictured in August)

The year after he divorced Melissa, Carrey walked down the aisle again and married his Dumb and Dumber co-star Lauren Holly. Their union was short lived and the pair split less than a year later.

He was previously engaged to Renée Zellweger for a year in 1999 after the two worked together in Me, Myself and Irene.

His most notable relationship was with model and actress Jenny McCarthy. The pair were together from 2005 to 2010.

Second time: The year after he divorced Melissa, Carrey walked down the aisle again and married his Dumb and Dumber co-star Lauren Holly (Pictured with Holly in 1996)

Later in life he dated an Irish woman, Cathriona White, who sadly died of an overdose in 2015 and the death was suspected to be a suicide.

The two had ended their romance at that point but Carey served as a pallbearer at her funeral.

In the wake of her death, White's ex-husband and her mother filed two separate wrongful death lawsuits against the actor. The latter suit was dismissed.
description: Jim Carrey and Ginger Gonzaga have reportedly split after less than a year of dating, according to Us Weekly.
